definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[שׁרב]] (√ of foll., parch; NH [[שָׁרַב]] be scorched (by sun), [[שָׁרָב]] parching heat (of sun); Sir 43:22 [[דש ן שרב]] parched grass; Aram. [[שְׁרב]], [[שְׁרֵיב]], 4rab, 4reb be parched, [[שְׁרב]] heat, drought: cf. prob. also As. n.pr. div. Šarrabu (-pu) Zim:KAT3. 415; >cp. Ar. sara0bun mirage [Rob:BR i. 42] Ges:Is 35, 7 al.; see against this esp. Che:Introd. Is 269).
